note:
What I enjoy: crafting all the things to de-stress. Walking, hiking, skiing, and kayaking with the family it all quiets my brain and allows for joy.

What I hate: Fear mongering, fake tears, bullies, and those that choose to be mean.

Work life: Agricultural educator with Rutgers University focusing on beginning farmer outreach, produce safety, and organic production.
👋⛰🐓🥦🍪🎿🚜🦠🇺🇸🧶🧵🪡🥾
